name: Hard Man
detailed_description: You the federal agent under cover. To you very important task - to destroy the leader of drug cartel which hid deeply in the bunker is set. The way to it passes through labyrinths with a set of traps which nobody can pass. Perform a task, kill the leader of gang and exempt the city from drugs. Be accurate and exact. Only experience and persistence will help to take place to you this hard way.
